comments:
Create a project with the RCP Mail template.  This actually contains two
ViewPart classes - the "View" that is the one we use as our test case and also a
"NavigationView".  The latter is the one used on the left hand side of the
actual RCP when it runs - it has a JFace TreeViewer so we don't render it at
design time which is OK cause we don't support viewers (yet) however when you
open it with the VE it throws a number of NPEs in BeanInfoCacheController at
line 817.  We should be able to open without any exceptions on this as because
it is part of the RCP examples people might try it.  We should also test case
the three other RCP template apps just to make sure we are OK with them

Rich, this is the NPE which occurs:
